title: Football Scoreboard Plugin Configuration
description: Configuration schema for the Football Scoreboard plugin

display_duration.description: Duration in seconds for the display controller to show this plugin mode before rotating to next plugin. Controls how long football_live, football_recent, or football_upcoming is shown before moving to next mode.

game_display_duration.description: Duration in seconds to show each individual game before rotating to the next game within the same mode. If you have 3 recent games, this controls how long each game is shown.

update_interval_seconds.description: How often to fetch new data (seconds)

nfl_favorite_teams.description: List of favorite NFL team abbreviations (e.g., TB, DAL, GB). Use 2-3 letter codes.

nfl_recent_games_to_show.description: Maximum number of recent NFL games to display

nfl_upcoming_games_to_show.description: Maximum number of upcoming NFL games to display

nfl_show_records.description: Show team records (wins-losses) for NFL games

nfl_show_ranking.description: Show team rankings for NFL games (when available)

nfl_show_odds.description: Show betting odds for NFL games

nfl_show_favorite_teams_only.description: Only show NFL games from favorite teams

nfl_show_all_live.description: Show all live NFL games, not just favorites

ncaa_fb_favorite_teams.description: List of favorite NCAA FB team abbreviations (e.g., UGA, AUB, BAMA). Use 2-4 letter codes.

ncaa_fb_show_recent.description: Show recently completed NCAA FB games

ncaa_fb_recent_games_to_show.description: Maximum number of recent NCAA FB games to display

ncaa_fb_upcoming_games_to_show.description: Maximum number of upcoming NCAA FB games to display

ncaa_fb_show_records.description: Show team records (wins-losses) for NCAA FB games

ncaa_fb_show_ranking.description: Show team rankings for NCAA FB games (rankings are very important in college football)

ncaa_fb_show_odds.description: Show betting odds for NCAA FB games

ncaa_fb_show_favorite_teams_only.description: Only show NCAA FB games from favorite teams

ncaa_fb_show_all_live.description: Show all live NCAA FB games, not just favorites
